content.question: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to 1, of, open parenthesis, x cubed, plus x, close parenthesis, times, open parenthesis, x to the fourth power, plus 2 times x squared, plus 9, close parenthesis raised to the one half power, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="4 times the square root of 3, end root, minus nine halves" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="16 times the square root of 3, end root, minus 18" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>16</mn><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt><mo>−</mo><mn>18</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
